src:
Buruan ke Bandung, West Java Festival 2019 Menanti Anda
02 Nov 2019, 05:26 by Anwar Siswadi (Kontributor), Ludhy Cahyana
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Pemerintah Provinsi Jawa Barat menggelar West Java Festival 2019 pada akhir pekan ini. Arenanya berpusat di Gedung Sate mulai Jumat-Ahad, 1-3 November 2019. Bagi penikmat kopi, bisa bergabung di acara minum kopi gratis yang berlangsung di dua lokasi sekaligus.
Jabar Lautan Kopi di Gedung Sate berlangsung 1-3 November 2019 mulai pukul 10 pagi hingga 10 malam. Pengunjung bisa menikmati sajian gratis kopi dari wilayah Jawa Barat selama acara. Acara yang dikelola Dinas Perkebunan Jawa Barat itu, juga menghadirkan para barista atau peracik kopi, peralatan, cara penyajian, serta pemanggangan biji kopi.Selain itu, pengunjung juga bisa menikmati kopi gratis di acara West Java Specialty Coffee Festival 2019. Waktunya pada 1-2 November 2019 di Trans Studio Mall Bandung. “Saya berharap event ini akan dapat menjadi hiburan yang bermakna untuk wisatawan-wisatawan yang mengunjungi Jawa Barat," kata Gubernur Jawa Barat Ridwan Kamil.



Tempo: Pengunjung West Java Festival 2019 di Gedung Sate Bandung ramai-ramai membakar ikan makarel. TEMPO/Anwar Siswadi Festival di Gedung Sate itu, juga dilengkapi talkshow komunitas dan ragam pertunjukan seperti band akustik, band indie, musik karinding, dan calung. Ada juga Festival Ikan yang diisi demo masak serta pembagian ikan bakar gartis sebanyak satu ton. “Setiap hari ikannya ada,” ujar seorang panitia. Para peminatnya menusuk sendiri ikan makarel dengan bambu yang telah disiapkan lalu ditunggui di tempat pembakaran sampai matang.Dari pantauan di lokasi Jumat siang, pengunjung memadati berbagai tempat acara yang menyebar dari depan hingga kedua samping Gedung Sate. Selain di panggung musik, sajian serba gratis seperti kopi, ikan bakar, juga kuliner lain menjadi tempat konsentrasi pengunjung.Jalan di depan Gedung Sate pun ditutup termasuk untuk pameran otomotif, sementara tenda-tenda kuliner ada yang berkumpul di Lapangan Gasibu seberang arena utama.



Jabar Lautan Kopi di West Java Festival Gedung Sate Bandung ikut membagikan kopi gratis ke pengunjung. TEMPO/Anwar Siswadi Pada Sabtu sekitar pukul 09.00 WIB, akan berlangsung karnaval budaya. Berlanjut sore hingga malam berupa hiburan di panggung. Rencananya akan tampil Dewi Gita, Rida, Sita, Dewi, Elfa’s Singer, dan Andi /Rif. Festival tersebut semuanya bisa diakses secara gratis. ANWAR SISWADI
text:
Hurry to Bandung, West Java Festival 2019 Awaits You
02 Nov 2019, 05:26 by Anwar Siswadi (Contributor), Ludhy Cahyana
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Government of West Java Province is holding the 2019 West Java Festival this weekend. The arena is centered at Gedung Sate from Friday-Sunday, 1-3 November 2019. For coffee connoisseurs, can join the free coffee drinking event which takes place in two locations at once.
Jabar Lautan Coffee at Gedung Sate takes place 1-3 November 2019 from 10 am to 10 pm Visitors can enjoy free coffee from the West Java region during the event. The event, which is managed by the West Java Plantation Office, also presents barista or coffee mixers, equipment, ways of serving, and roasting coffee beans. In addition, visitors can also enjoy free coffee at the 2019 Java Java Specialty Coffee Festival. Time for 1-2 November 2019 at Trans Studio Mall Bandung. "I hope this event will be a meaningful entertainment for tourists visiting West Java," said West Java Governor Ridwan Kamil.



Tempo: Visitors to the 2019 West Java Festival in Gedung Sate Bandung are busy burning mackerel. TEMPO / Anwar Siswadi Festival at Gedung Sate, also features community talk shows and various performances such as acoustic bands, indie bands, karinding music, and calung. There is also a Fish Festival which is filled with cooking demonstrations and distribution of one tonne of grilled grilled fish. "Every day there are fish," said a committee. The enthusiasts stabbed themselves mackerel with bamboo which had been prepared and then waited at the incinerator until it was cooked. From the observation at the location on Friday afternoon, visitors filled various event venues that spread from the front to the two sides of Gedung Sate. In addition to the music stage, free food such as coffee, grilled fish, as well as other culinary places became the concentration of visitors. The road in front of Gedung Sate was closed, including for automotive exhibitions, while culinary tents gathered at Gasibu Square opposite the main arena.



Jabar Lautan Kopi at West Java Festival Gedung Sate Bandung also distributes free coffee to visitors. TEMPO / Anwar Siswadi On Saturday at around 09.00 WIB, a cultural carnival will take place. Continues afternoon to evening in the form of entertainment on stage. The plan will appear Dewi Gita, Rida, Sita, Dewi, Elfa’s Singer, and Andi / Rif. All of these festivals can be accessed free of charge. ANWAR SISWADI
